The 'Progress D-27' is a two-shaft propfan engine developed by Ivchenko
Progress. The D-27 engine's core is not related to or derived from the D-36
turbofan which is a three-shaft turbofan. The D-27 engine was developed
specifically to power the An-70 military transport aircraft and to be a base
platform for future engine derivatives.
